title: Phishing Scams
description: Learn about how hackers can steal information without even compromising your computer.

content.content: A phishing scam is an attempt by an attacker to get you to reveal personal information by pretending to be a trustworthy party. This can range from simple emails from people claming to be from the police, to websites that appear to be real, but are actually fraudulent and steal your login information once inputted.
How Can I Avoid Phising Scams?

Never click on any suspicious links, and if redirected to what seems like a trustworthy site, don't input any sensitive information until you can verify that the site is legimate. If an email seems suspicious, do NOT click any links in its contents. Phishing messages typically threaten you with action and may ask for personal login details.
